aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.intro: Welcome to your perfect countryside escape! 🏡
aboutUs.description: Tucked away in the heart of Brezane, a charming village near Požarevac, our wooden A-frame house is more than just a place to stay - it’s a peaceful retreat built with love by the Stefanović family. We opened our doors in May 2025, and ever since, we've been sharing our little slice of paradise with guests looking to unwind, unplug, and enjoy nature’s simplicity.
aboutUs.comforts: Our home is where rustic charm meets modern comfort. Surrounded by greenery and fresh village air, the property offers everything you need for an unforgettable stay:

features.pool: A swimming pool for sunny days ☀️
features.patio: A cozy patio and fully-equipped garden kitchen
features.bbq: A barbecue area and a traditional Serbian ražanj (rotisserie grill) 🍖
features.firePit: A fire pit for starlit storytelling 🔥
features.playground: A fun-filled playground for the little ones
features.backyard: A large backyard with cornhole, picado, and plenty of space for relaxing 🌳
features.petFriendly: Pet-friendly! Because vacations are better with furry friends 🐾

aboutUs.closing: Whether you're celebrating, recharging, or just escaping the city buzz, our home is your home.
aboutUs.extra: And if you're up for a mountain adventure, we’ve got you covered there too! The Stefanović family also owns a beautiful apartment in Zlatibor, one of Serbia’s most popular mountain destinations—ideal for winter getaways or summer hiking trips.
aboutUs.note: We're a family-owned business, and we take pride in creating a cozy and welcoming atmosphere for every guest. No big corporations, just genuine Serbian hospitality and the joy of sharing what we’ve built with you.
aboutUs.final: We can’t wait to welcome you to Brezane. Come as guests, leave as friends! 💛

homeInfo.subtitle: Escape to nature in our charming A-frame retreat nestled in Brezane.

homeInfo2.title: Walnut Pool House
homeInfo2.subtitle: – Where Nature Meets Refined Living –
homeInfo2.p1: Welcome to Walnut Pool House – a charming frame wooden retreat nestled in the peaceful village of Brezane, near Požarevac. Surrounded by a serene walnut forest, this cozy getaway blends nature’s calm with the comfort of modern living ✨.
homeInfo2.p2: Whether you’re seeking a tranquil escape, a relaxed family gathering, a sunny afternoon by the pool, or a laid-back barbecue with friends – we’ve got you covered. Our space is designed for small groups looking to unwind, reconnect, and enjoy the quiet beauty of the countryside.
homeInfo2.p3: We would be more than happy to welcome you and show you exactly why we fell in love with this place – and why we think you will too 💛.
